I want to encourage a positive interaction, but also to maintain a degree of artistic mystery. I want to demonstrate a willingness to engage, but also to remain a little...unpredictable. 

Finally, I will give 2 dollars

It’s important to me that this isn't just some transaction, but an opportunity to build a little bridge, even if it’s just for a moment.
